title: Sitecore logo
content:
hey there…

anybody has a clue of what this font is? or what is it made of? since it looks a bit like a version of an already existing font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sitecore\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070331125311/http:/typophile.com/files/sitecore_logo.jpg) | 44.29 KB |
author: minuskelbundt

comments.content: the font is DAX from FontFactory - look slike Dax Bold - some tweaking to the “T”

It’s not Dax… in any way at all. I’m beginning to think it’s custom. I did a bit of a search and found [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20070331125311/http:/www.090978.org/2005/10/who-was-first-bittorrent-vs-sitecore.html). If you really want to find out, you could contact “Gert”.

yeah, im starting to think its custom also..  
:)

thanks!
